trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around January 20th 2008
Summary: Cigar shaped bright object dropped from the sky and dipped a little crossed my path then flew up
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home on January 20, 2008 traveling North IH35 and turned west to exit on Judson Rd. I was on Judson Rd about 5 minutes in a residental area. There were 4 lanes, 2 going east and 2 going west. I was driving on the inside lane going west. It was a clear nights with no haze in the sky. There was a car behind me traveling west and about 5-6 cars sizes behind me. The time was 1:16 AM. I had not been drinking and I was alert. A flash on my right side came from up above and dipped a little across my path. I saw a very bright cigar shaped light with a faint short tail speed extremely fast crossing my path then ascend up towards the clear sky and disappeared. The cigar shape object was so very bright. The car behind me pulled off to the shoulder of the road. I pulled off by a closed gas station and pulled out my binoculars but saw only the clear sky. Then I continued home since I was alone. I am not good at measurements of distances.
